body:
# ALI ASIF
## B-37, BLOCK-9,
## Gulshan-e-Iqbal, Karachi. Mobile No: 0321-2043624
### Email: aliasif_bce@yahoo.com
### Skype: aliasif_mse
### Linkedin : http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=177259148&trk=tab_pro
## Career Objective 
To get a position where my professional approach, education, skill and experience will
be an asset to the continued growth of an organization.
## Education
* 2010- Present Masters (Software Engineering), Bahria University Karachi.
* 2004-2008 B.C.E (Computer Engineering), Bahria University Karachi.
* 2000-2002 H.S.C at Jauhar Degree College, Karachi
* 1998-2000 S.S.C at Army Public School , Hyderabad.

## Projects
* APNS Clearance System : It is Account Clearance System develop
using C#,.Net and Sql Server for APNS(All Pakistan News Paper
Society).
* SE Accounts: It is a Accounts System develop for Shayan Enterprises(
Garments Wholesaler) using MS Access .
* POS: It is a Inventory Management System develop for Rose’n’Rose
(Boutique) with bar code facility using MS Access.
## Additional Information
* Articulate and good interpersonal communication skill.
* Fluent in English, Punjabi, Urdu.
* Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
* Good Innovative and Learning skill.
* Ability and willingness to adapt quickly to new technologies.
* Excellent logic and troubleshooting skills.
* Ability to have a deep analysis for a problem.
